Hi,
we’ve been trying out our swerve with YAGSL, however we are currently facing some problems
Here’s our GitHub code
and the video of our swerve
FRC Web Components

Any help is appreciated!
Thanks!

yeah:

however we are currently facing some problems

“Here are some answers to your problems.”

All jokes aside, we’re not mind readers. Please describe the problems you’re having. Having the video is nice, but most won’t even look at it without at least a description of the problem so we know what to focus on while watching it.

Sorry for that,
our problem is that even though we have push the joystick to the max value , the drive motors are still moving at a slow speed.
